task.summary: Added Song List, mp3 scanner, basic audio play functionality.
Added SeekBar,Prev and Next functionality, Duration updates for Elapsed and Remaining.
Seekbar update enhanced; blink effect added; filewalker optimised; switch to next song on completion
Added loading splash screen to cover for filewalker; ID3 meta tag support; cleaned songlist UI; Changed ArrayList from File to String
Added clean custom listview, special icon for now playing track; Added View Holder and three more ArrayLists to reduce calculations during view construction.
Truncated long text in Song List with ...; Added Rescan functionality; Internal Storage file handling for Song List; Exception Handling for non existent songs.
Replaced Filewalker with Content Resolver - Major Upgrade and Improvements with Refactoring; Fixed setMax on auto next song
Replaced native MediaPlayer with Audio Service; Acquired Partial Wakelock; Fixed pause and resume bugs, exit and rescan functionality.
Added SectionIndexer to show Alphabet Overlay; Translucent Dividers between list items; Update SongList on change of playing song; Ellipsize list item text to truncate long strings.
Repeat and Shuffle functionalities; Better grouping in SectionIndexer; Overrode Back button to move task to background; Improved list refreshing; Cleaner UI
Removed Rating Bar, added Index and Duration; Added shadows to timers and improved blinking effect.
Removed Rating Bar, added Index and Duration; Added shadows to timers and improved blinking effect.
Added Swipe feature for Prev/Next; Improved Repeat feature; Filtered out small songs; Added new Screens.

MESSAGE.value: Added Song List, mp3 scanner, basic audio play functionality.
Added SeekBar,Prev and Next functionality, Duration updates for Elapsed and Remaining.
Seekbar update enhanced; blink effect added; filewalker optimised; switch to next song on completion
Added loading splash screen to cover for filewalker; ID3 meta tag support; cleaned songlist UI; Changed ArrayList from File to String
Added clean custom listview, special icon for now playing track; Added View Holder and three more ArrayLists to reduce calculations during view construction.
Truncated long text in Song List with ...; Added Rescan functionality; Internal Storage file handling for Song List; Exception Handling for non existent songs.
Replaced Filewalker with Content Resolver - Major Upgrade and Improvements with Refactoring; Fixed setMax on auto next song
Replaced native MediaPlayer with Audio Service; Acquired Partial Wakelock; Fixed pause and resume bugs, exit and rescan functionality.
Added SectionIndexer to show Alphabet Overlay; Translucent Dividers between list items; Update SongList on change of playing song; Ellipsize list item text to truncate long strings.
Repeat and Shuffle functionalities; Better grouping in SectionIndexer; Overrode Back button to move task to background; Improved list refreshing; Cleaner UI
Removed Rating Bar, added Index and Duration; Added shadows to timers and improved blinking effect.
Added Swipe feature for Prev/Next; Improved Repeat feature; Filtered out small songs; Added new Screens.

option.value: Added Swipe feature for Prev/Next; Improved Repeat feature; Filtered out small songs; Added new Screens.
